entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early this afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind east 20 km/h. High 7. Wind chill minus 7 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Fog patches developing late this evening. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of showers. High 9. POP 30%
